detail_desc: Set with a dress and leggings. Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, a chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Braided imitation suede belt. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
All-in-one suit in printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Calf-length wrap dress in sturdy satin with a deep V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Long balloon sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Ties at the waist and a wrapover skirt with a wide, flounced trim and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Decorative elastic straps at the hem that fasten around the bodice, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short wrapover skirt in airy chiffon with draping. High waist with pleats, concealed press-studs and a belt with metal D-rings. Lined.

Trainers in imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles. The trainers are made partly from recycled polyester.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.
Two-strand metal necklace with one thin and one chunkier chain. The thinner chain has a round pendant. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and decorative ties at the hem.
Short in a soft weave with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front and back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton piqué.
Wide, straight-cut sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a round, slightly wider neckline, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded baseball jacket in nylon with an embroidered motif on the chest, a striped stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sequins on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short imitation leather skirt with a high waist with a frill trim and adjustable drawstring. Lined.
Belt in leather with an embossed pattern. Metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Round neckline with a raw, roll edge, a chest pocket and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined stand-up collar, zip down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Short faux fur jacket with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, collar, and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in jersey with a twill feel. High waist, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, large front patch pockets, back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Chukka boots in imitation leather with heel caps and lace eyelet panel in imitation suede. Padded top edge, a tongue and lacing at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Off-the-shoulder playsuit in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Wide, pleated flounce at the top with concealed elastication and voluminous, balloon sleeves with narrow, internal elastication at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication and pleats at the waist and wide, flared legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps and a mesh racer back. Elastic hem and a fastening at the back. Light support.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams. Detachable hood with an elastic drawstring, press-studs down the front and reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and fastenings at the front with one visible and one concealed button. Pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Metal rings in various designs.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Longer-style cardigan in a rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, welt side pockets and a zip down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Dress in a viscose weave with an embroidered motif on the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and decorative ties at the waist, and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and short puff sleeve. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft slub cotton jersey with broderie anglaise at the front, frills that continue over the shoulders and press-studs at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with smocked hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar with narrow ties, pleats and a V-neck opening at the front. Gently dropped shoulders, short flutter sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Cardigan in a fine knit with a supersoft, brushed finish. V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ties at the hem.

Long dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Satin-lined bodice.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with a concealed button at the front. Jersey lining.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave. Wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication and gathers for added width, 3/4-length, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.

Pyjamas in ribbed jersey made from a soft viscose blend with a strappy top and calf-length bottoms. V-neck top with buttons at the top, an elasticated top edge and narrow, adjustable elastic shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and wide, straight legs.
Short dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a detachable belt.
Knee-length shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 55x160 cm.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and sewn-in ties at the back of the waist. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Gloves in soft leather with fine-knit cuffs and a tab with an adjustable press-stud fastening. Lined.
Set with three pairs of metal hoop earrings and three pairs of studs in various designs. Diameter of earrings 4.5 cm, 7 cm and 9 cm. Diameter of studs approx. 0.5 cm.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in an airy, patterned dobby weave with dropped shoulders and long, cuffed sleeves. No fasteners.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a wide foldover top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover front and an elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Short sleeves and short legs.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Lined.
Skirt in washed, stretch denim decorated with glittery studs (except in sizes 1½-3Y). Covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in an airy weave with covered elastication at the waist, a small frill trim at the top, detachable tie belt and concealed pockets in the side seams.

Tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with lace details. Moulded, padded, opening cups, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with padded, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. No fasteners.

Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with narrow ties. Double-layered yoke with a seam and gathers at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and rounded hem.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly, front pockets and decorative seams on the back pockets. Flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening at the back and covered button at the back of the neck. Gently gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Long raglan sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck and wrapover front. Concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and skirt with box pleats. Partly lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
